name: places/ChIJrfYZhMBYwokRpOarj33uY64
formattedAddress: 309 E 75th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 309 E 75th St, New York, NY 10021, USA

editorialSummary.text: Intimate beauty parlor providing women & men's haircuts, coloring, straightening & extensions.

originalText.text:
I have come here 3 times for a hair cut and blowout - I have had great service with 3 separate stylists! I always leave happy with a great cut and style!

The whole team is so nice, everyone is friendly and looking to make sure they take care of their customers. I love the neighborhood feel - I will be back!

text.text:
I have come here 3 times for a hair cut and blowout - I have had great service with 3 separate stylists! I always leave happy with a great cut and style!

The whole team is so nice, everyone is friendly and looking to make sure they take care of their customers. I love the neighborhood feel - I will be back!

originalText.text: The most amazing hair salon ever!  It truly is a hidden gem . . . they are true artists . . . they really care about your hair, they take pride in their work, and the same staff has been there forever, which means they treat their people well too .... I'm extremely fussy about my hair, and know for a fact that with Da Pietro, I will never had a bad hair day!

text.text: The most amazing hair salon ever!  It truly is a hidden gem . . . they are true artists . . . they really care about your hair, they take pride in their work, and the same staff has been there forever, which means they treat their people well too .... I'm extremely fussy about my hair, and know for a fact that with Da Pietro, I will never had a bad hair day!

originalText.text: Although the hairstylist has years of experience, he wasn't listening to what I was asking for. I wanted to dye my hair...he put in just a toner. It DID NOT cover my Grey hair..which was the only thing I continuously asked him to do. At the end he said I could come back to re-dye it all....but that it might not be the same color. Overall, disappointing service and not worth the money.

text.text: Although the hairstylist has years of experience, he wasn't listening to what I was asking for. I wanted to dye my hair...he put in just a toner. It DID NOT cover my Grey hair..which was the only thing I continuously asked him to do. At the end he said I could come back to re-dye it all....but that it might not be the same color. Overall, disappointing service and not worth the money.

originalText.text: Da Pietro is a hidden gem! As someone who is extremely fussy with their hair, I am beyond thankful to have found them. Everyone is extremely friendly and talented. The prices are very reasonable and the quality is unparalleled.

text.text: Da Pietro is a hidden gem! As someone who is extremely fussy with their hair, I am beyond thankful to have found them. Everyone is extremely friendly and talented. The prices are very reasonable and the quality is unparalleled.

originalText.text: I had a coupon and needed a balayage touch up.  I showed the stylist a photo of what I wanted and he wound up making the look even better! the color of my balayage  fits my skin tone and looks great. He even took the time to suggest a shampoo for me and gave me one upon leaving! The stylist who washed my hair and helped with my balayage (I have extremely long hair) was also so kind and professional. Definitely Recommended for coloring. Thank you Da Pietro!
